mapper.insert: INSERT INTO concustm( cust_id, cust_nm, rep_fax_no, rep_tel_no, corp_ad_no, mgr_nm, mgr_email_addr, mgr_tel_no, crt_id, crt_ip, ad_date, udt_id, udt_ip, udt_date ) VALUES ( #{custId}, #{custNm}, #{repFaxNo}, #{repTelNo}, #{corpAdNo}, #{mgrNm}, #{mgrEmailAddr}, #{mgrTelNo}, #{crtId}, #{crtIp}, current_timestamp, #{udtId}, #{udtIp}, current_timestamp )
